## ConnectionChecker.canConnectToPrevious\_() method

Helper function for drag checking.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected canConnectToPrevious_(a: Connection, b: Connection): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Connection](./blockly.connection.md) | The connection to check, which must be a statement input or next connection. |
|  b | [Connection](./blockly.connection.md) | A nearby connection to check, which must be a previous connection. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the connection is allowed, false otherwise.
